publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2337 Dr Richard Simpson: Educational Seminars from Fife Constabularyâ€”That the Parliament congratulates all those involved in Operation Eden, the educational seminars from police education liaison officers from Fife Constabulary and Glenrothes schools, for their success in delivering 250 seminars resulting in a substantial reduction in youth crime, and looks forward to the longer-term outcomes being evaluated and, if these indicate success, the roll out of this programme both across Fife and nationally.
